title:
oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set - 446°F Heat Resistant,Turner Tongs,Spatula,Spoon,Brush,Whisk,Wooden Handles Pink Kitchen Gadgets Tools Set for Nonstick Cookware;
BPA Free, heat-resistant, non-melting, wooden handle, easy to clean
descriptions:
oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils – 14‑Piece Kitchen Set

Simple, safe, and gentle on your pots and pans. This set is made to make cooking easier and more comfortable.

What you get:
- 14 useful tools: Deep Soup Ladle, Solid Serving Spoon, Slotted Spoon, Slotted Turner, Regular Turner, Food Tongs, Pasta Server, Flexible Spatula, Small Silicone Spatula, Round Spatula Turner, Large Skimmer Spoon, Basting Brush, Whisk, and a Utensil Holder to keep them together.

Easy on your hands and cookware:
- Soft, food-grade silicone heads protect nonstick pans from scratches.
- Strong inside, gentle outside: each tool has a stainless steel core for strength and a wooden handle that stays cool and feels good to hold.
- One-piece silicone heads with no gaps, so food doesn’t get stuck and cleaning is simple.

Safe and dependable:
- BPA-free, food safe, and odorless after first airing.
- Heat resistant up to 446°F (230°C), so they won’t melt during normal cooking.
- Not for the dishwasher; a quick hand wash with warm soapy water is best.

Before first use (to remove any factory smell):
1) Soak the silicone parts in warm water for about 30 minutes.
2) Let them air out for about 3 hours.
Then they are ready to use.

Why you’ll like them:
- Gentle on wrists and easy to grip.
- Tools you’ll actually use every day.
- Sturdy and long-lasting.

Need help?
- Friendly support replies within 12 hours.

Make cooking simpler, safer, and kinder to your pots with the oannao Silicone Cooking Utensils Kitchen Utensil Set.
